title: Sekai de Ichiban Hayai Haru
sinopse:
"If I re-do my life, I want to return this work back to Yukishima-senpai." Haruta Mahoro who became a successful mangaka after publishing “Revive line” from her dead senpai's notes. What if a fateful encounter brings her back to the past?

(Source: Cheesecake Scans)
